alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 11:34AM MST until December 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Snow, winds gusting to 45 mph, blowing snow reducing visibility to around a mile at times, and significant drifting of snow, will make travel and outdoor activities very difficult. Rural roads may drift shut making travel impossible. Travel is discouraged, especially tonight.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slick and snow covered roads along with poor visibility and drifting snow. Delay travel if you can. If you must travel slow down and use caution while traveling and have a winter survival kit in the car in case you become stranded. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
